alert.note: Alert for Chisago (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:15AM CST until March 06 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Chisago County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
